title: PMYP Chairman welcomes Commonwealth Secretary General’s maiden visit to Pakistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 29 (APP):Chairman of Prime Minister Youth Programme Rana Mashood Ahmad Khan has welcomed the maiden visit of Commonwealth Secretary-General Patricia Scotland to the country.
He, in a news statement, lauded the role played by Patricia Scotland in the Commonwealth during the last eight years. “The services of the Secretary General for the youth development are instrumental,” he added.
The chairman PMYP said the visit of Patricia Scotland was a true reflection of strong ties between Pakistan and the Commonwealth.
As a member of the Commonwealth of Nations, Pakistan attached great importance to its institutions, he remarked.
